item.description: Vin Scully was the last remaining enduring voice of baseball. He became the voice of the Dodgers in the the 1950s when they were in Brooklyn and was the only voice the L.A. Dodgers ever had up until 2016. I will most remember his call of Kirk Gibson’s ... https://t.co/6GPj79RUwa
